name: Underground River
description: A flowing underground river creates natural transportation routes and provides fresh water, but the darkness and strong currents make navigation dangerous. The water can lead to hidden chambers or surface exits, while the constant flow can carry away valuable items.
atmosphere: Flowing ribbon of water hidden beneath surface. Natural transportation route through darkness. Cool air scented of fresh water, earth, and hidden secrets. Absolute darkness creates mystery and danger. Strong currents make navigation dangerous. Water leads to hidden chambers or surface exits. Constant flow creates movement and life feeling.
